We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Manager

Job Ref: ZC/SMS/0826
Job Location:&nbsp;Central Business District, Abuja (FCT)&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Overview


	We are looking for a creative and strategic Social Media Manager to join our team at Zuma Coffee.
	This is an on-site position that requires expertise in creating engaging content, analytics, driving brand awareness, and managing all our social media platforms.
	The Social Media Manager will work closely with the marketing team to promote our brand across multiple channels, grow our online community, and enhance customer engagement.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and implement a social media strategy that aligns with company goals.
	Create, curate, and manage content for all social media platforms (Instagram, Facebook, Youtube,X, etc.).
	Monitor and analyze the performance of social media campaigns using analytics tools.
	Engage with our online community, respond to customer inquiries, and manage brand reputation.
	Collaborate with the design and marketing teams to create visually appealing content.
	Stay up-to-date with social media trends and best practices to ensure maximum engagement.
	Track key performance indicators (KPIs) and generate reports to assess the effectiveness of campaigns.


Minimum Qualifications


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field.
	Proven experience managing social media accounts for brands or companies.
	Strong understanding of social media platforms, analytics tools, and content creation.
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
	Basic/ Intermediate technical skills.


Method of Application

  "title": "Customer Service Officer",
  "description": "Westfield Consulting Limited -&nbsp;Our client in the Microfinance Banking space, is looking for qualified and passionate candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Service Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Nigeria
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Financial Service

Job Purpose


	Render excellent service to both internal and external customers; this is done through the provision of assistance to customers through account opening and maintenance, information on the Banks products and services, as well as ensuring timely and exceptional service delivery to delight them.


Key Responsibilities


	Escalate all customer care issues to the Head of Operations and follow through on corrective measures.
	Sell the Banks products and services to existing customers and intending prospects.
	Ensure a seamless flow of business transactions by communicating necessary information to the customers and bank departments as required.
	Disseminate basic technical knowledge of the products and services offered by the bank to internal and external customers.
	Open all account types in the bank for various customers and ensure all accounts have complete documentation.
	Treat customers request and instructions on their various accounts and ensure they are satisfied with services provided.
	Attend to customers&rsquo; complaints, request, instructions, enquiries etc.
	Arrange all documents and account opening packages appropriately.
	Handle account maintenance activities; balance enquiry, freezing/unfreezing of account, placing of lien, reactivation of dormant accounts.
	Initiate the set-up of standing order.
	Issue and activate all card products to eligible customers.
	Carry out all other bank services as delegated by the Head of Operations.
	Initiate and set up Alert, Online and Mobile Banking services.
	Initiate linking / hot listing and blocking / unblocking of debit cards.
	Send out / respond to external account reference enquiries, confirm status of internal account reference.
	Ensure timely rendering of reports and issuance of ad hoc statements of account to customers.


Requirements


	Minimum of a first degree
	Minimum of 2 years in a Financial Institution environment
	Knowledge of financial service channels.arket/y
	Knowledge of customer needs across different segments such as income, geography, culture, demography and markets (Market segmentation and analysis).
	Knowledge of the retail banking market.
	Knowledge of micro and macro economics
	Knowledge of financial markets analysis.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their current CV to:&nbsp;victor.allu@westfield-consulting.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Customer Service Officer Job at Westfield Consulting Limited




        
    

        
        Westfield Consulting Limited - Our client in the Microfinance Banking space, is looking for qualified and passionate candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Service Officer

Job Location: Nigeria
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Financial Service

Job Purpose
     

            
    




	Render excellent service to both internal and external customers; this is done through the provision of assistance to customers through account opening and maintenance, information on the Banks products and services, as well as ensuring timely and exceptional service delivery to delight them.


Key Responsibilities


	Escalate all customer care issues to the Head of Operations and follow through on corrective measures.
	Sell the Banks products and services to existing customers and intending prospects.
	Ensure a seamless flow of business transactions by communicating necessary information to the customers and bank departments as required.
	Disseminate basic technical knowledge of the products and services offered by the bank to internal and external customers.
	Open all account types in the bank for various customers and ensure all accounts have complete documentation.
	Treat customers request and instructions on their various accounts and ensure they are satisfied with services provided.
	Attend to customers’ complaints, request, instructions, enquiries etc.
	Arrange all documents and account opening packages appropriately.
	Handle account maintenance activities; balance enquiry, freezing/unfreezing of account, placing of lien, reactivation of dormant accounts.
	Initiate the set-up of standing order.
	Issue and activate all card products to eligible customers.
	Carry out all other bank services as delegated by the Head of Operations.
	Initiate and set up Alert, Online and Mobile Banking services.
	Initiate linking / hot listing and blocking / unblocking of debit cards.
	Send out / respond to external account reference enquiries, confirm status of internal account reference.
	Ensure timely rendering of reports and issuance of ad hoc statements of account to customers.


Requirements


	Minimum of a first degree
	Minimum of 2 years in a Financial Institution environment
	Knowledge of financial service channels.arket/y
	Knowledge of customer needs across different segments such as income, geography, culture, demography and markets (Market segmentation and analysis).
	Knowledge of the retail banking market.
	Knowledge of micro and macro economics
	Knowledge of financial markets analysis.


Method of Application
